item.title: Server installation
item.description: Installing Eversity is actually very easy! For it you will need to have these things: School (or any other educational institution, really) that is connected to Schools.by platform A working server that supports OpenJDK 16 (In this tutorial private VPS with Ubuntu 20.04. 1 GB RAM, 1 CPU core was used) IP address, available from the internet with public domain (optional) ~2 GB of Internet traffic ~20 minutes of time Got it?
